member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.Ide.Common.RadSplitter.ProjectManagement
member.summary: Utility class for Design - Time VisualStudio.NET project management.

member.name: T:Telerik.RadSplitterUtils.PropertyCategory
member.summary: Defines the common property categories' names

member.name: P:Telerik.RadSplitterUtils.RadControl.Version
member.summary: Gets the component's current version.

member.name: P:Telerik.RadSplitterUtils.RadControl.UseEmbeddedScripts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the embedded JavaScript files or not.
member.value: True if embedded JavaScript files are to be used; otherwise false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: Use this property for debugging purposes or to apply any modifications to the JavaScript files.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItem.Index
member.summary: This property is being used internally by the RadSplitter control. Setting it may lead to unpredictable results.
member.remarks: The Index property is used internally.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.MinWidth
member.summary: Sets/gets the min width to which the pane can be resized

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.MaxWidth
member.summary: Sets/gets the max width to which the pane can be resized

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.MinHeight
member.summary: Sets/gets the min height to which the pane can be resized

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.MaxHeight
member.summary: Sets/gets the max height to which the pane can be resized

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.Scrolling
member.summary: Sets/gets whether the content of the pane will get a scrollbars when it exceeds the pane area size

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.OnClientPaneCollapsed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called when the RadPane is collapsed.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientPaneCollapsed client-side event handler is called when the RadPane is collapsed. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;
eventArgs with one property, paneObj (the instance of the RadPane).

remarks.para: This event cannot be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.OnClientBeforePaneCollapse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called before the RadPane is collapsed.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientBeforePaneCollapse client-side event handler is called before the RadPane is collapsed. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;
eventArgs with one property, paneObj (the instance of the RadPane).

remarks.para: This event can be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.OnClientPaneExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called when the RadPane is expanded.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientPaneExpanded client-side event handler is called when the RadPane is expanded. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;
eventArgs with one property, paneObj (the instance of the RadPane).

remarks.para: This event cannot be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.OnClientBeforePaneExpand
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called before the RadPane is expanded.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientBeforePaneExpand client-side event handler is called before the RadPane is expanded. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;
eventArgs with one property, paneObj (the instance of the RadPane).

remarks.para: This event can be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.OnClientPaneResized
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called when the RadPane is resized.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientPaneResized client-side event handler is called when the RadPane is resized. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;

eventArgs with the following properties:
paneObj - the pane object that has been resized
oldWidth - the width of the pane before the resize
oldHeight - the height of the pane before the resize
newWidth - the current pane width
newHeight - the current pane height

remarks.para: This event cannot be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.OnClientBeforePaneResize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called before the RadPane is resized.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientBeforePaneResize client-side event handler is called before the RadPane is resized. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;

eventArgs with the following properties:
paneObj - the pane object that will be resized
delta - the delta with which the pane will be resized
direction - the direction in which the pane will be resized. You can use the RadSplitterNamespace.RAD_SPLITTER_DIRECTION hash to check the direction. The 2 possible values are : Forward and Backward

remarks.para: This event can be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadPaneBase.PersistScrollPosition
member.summary: Sets/gets whether the scrolls position will be persisted acrosss postbacks

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter
member.summary: Telerik RadSplitter is a flexible UI component for ASP.NET applications which allows users to manage effectively the content size and layout.

member.summary: Sets/gets the pixels that should be substracted from the splitter height when its height is defined in percent

member.summary: Resize the splitter in 100% of the page

member.summary: Whether the Splitter should be visible during its initialization or not

member.summary: Sets/gets the width of the splitter

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter.LiveResize
member.summary: Sets/gets whether the rendering of the splitter panes is previewed during the resize

member.summary: Sets/gets whether the splitter will be resized when the browser window is resized. The Width or Height properties should be defined in percent.

member.summary: Sets/gets whether the splitter will resize when the parent pane is resized

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter.OnClientLoaded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called when the RadSplitter control is initialized.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientLoaded client-side event handler is called when the RadSplitter is initialized. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;
eventArgs with one property, splitterObj (the instance of the RadSplitter object).

remarks.para: This event cannot be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter.OnClientResized
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called when the RadSplitter is resized.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientResized client-side event handler is called when the RadSplitter is resized. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;

eventArgs with the following properties:
splitterObj - the splitter object that has been resized
oldWidth - the width of the splitter before the resize
oldHeight - the height of the splitter before the resize
newWidth - the current splitter width
newHeight - the current splitter height

remarks.para: This event cannot be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter.OnClientBeforeResize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the client-side event handler that is called before the RadSplitter is resized.
member.value: A string specifying the name of the JavaScript function that will handle the event. The default value is empty string.

remarks.para: If specified, the OnClientBeforeResize client-side event handler is called before the RadSplitter is resized. Two parameters are passed to the handler:

list.item: event, the event object;

eventArgs with the following properties:
splitterObj - the splitter object that will be resized
newWidth - the new width that will be applied to the RadSplitter object
newHeight - the new height that will be applied to the RadSplitter object

remarks.para: This event can be cancelled.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter.Skin
member.summary: Gets or sets the skin used by RadSplitter.
member.value: A String specifying the skin. The default value is empty string ("").
member.remarks: If the value is empty string ("") no skin is used.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitter.SkinsPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative path to the Skin folder.
member.remarks: The ~ at the begining of the SkinPath denotes the application root path.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterCollapseDirection
member.summary: Specifies the collapse direction options of the splitter bar

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterCollapseDirection.Forward
member.summary: On collapse the current pane is collapsed

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterCollapseDirection.Backward
member.summary: On collapse the next pane is resized

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection
member.summary: A collection of RadSplitterItem objects in a RadSplitter control.

remarks.para: The RadSplitterItemsCollection class represents a collection of RadSplitterItem objects. The RadSplitterItem objects in turn represent panes items within a RadSplitter control.

list.item: Use the indexer to programmatically retrieve a single RadSplitterItem from the collection, using array notation.
Use the Count property to determine the total number of panes in the collection.
Use the Add method to add panes in the collection.
Use the Remove method to remove panes from the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.#ctor(Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RadSplitterItemsCollection class.
member.remarks: Use the constructor to create a new RadSplitterItemsCollection class.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.Add(Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItem)
member.summary: Appends a RadSplitterItem to the end of the collection.

example.para: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add items in a RadSplitter control.
example.code:
Dim pane As RadPane = New RadPane()
RadMenu1.Panes.Add(pane)

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItem)
member.summary: Inserts the specified RadSplitterItem in the collection at the specified index location.
member.remarks: Use the Insert method to add a RadSplitterItem to the collection at the index specified by the index parameter.
member.param: The location in the collection to insert the RadSplitterItem.
The RadSplitterItem to add to the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.IndexOf(Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItem)
member.summary: Determines the index value that represents the position of the specified RadSplitterItem in the collection.
member.returns: The zero-based index position of the specified RadSplitterItem in the collection.
member.remarks: Use the IndexOf method to determine the index value of the RadSplitterItem specified by the item parameter in the collection. If an item with this criteria is not found in the collection, -1 is returned.
member.param: A RadSplitterItem to search for in the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.Contains(Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItem)
member.summary: Determines whether the collection contains the specified RadSplitterItem.
member.returns: true if the collection contains the specified item; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: Use the Contains method to determine whether the RadSplitterItem specified by the item parameter is in the collection.
member.param: A RadSplitterItem to search for in the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.Remove(Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItem)
member.summary: Removes the specified RadSplitterItem from the collection.
member.remarks: Use the Remove method to remove a RadSplitterItem from the collection.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the RadSplitterItem at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.para: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the RadSplitterItem at the specified index from the collection.

member.param: The index of the RadSplitterItem to remove.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.
member.remarks: Use the Clear method to remove all items from the collection. The Count property is set to 0.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterItemsCollection.Item(System.Int32)

summary.para: Gets a RadSplitterItem at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.para: Use this indexer to get a RadSplitterItem from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.

member.param: The zero-based index of the RadSplitterItem to retrieve from the collection.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterOrientation
member.summary: Specifies Orientation options for the RadSplitter object

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterOrientation.Vertical
member.summary: Splitter panes are rendered verticaly

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterOrientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Splitter panes are rendered horizontaly

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterPaneScrolling
member.summary: Specifies the scrolling options for the RadPane object

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterPaneScrolling.Both
member.summary: Both X and Y scrolls are displayed

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterPaneScrolling.X
member.summary: Only the scroll on X dimension is displayed

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterPaneScrolling.Y
member.summary: Only the scroll on Y dimension is displayed

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterPaneScrolling.None
member.summary: No scrolls are displayed

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterResizeMode
member.summary: Specifies resize mode options for the RadSplitter object

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterResizeMode.AdjacentPane
member.summary: On resize of a pane the adjacent pane is resized also

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterResizeMode.Proportional
member.summary: On resize of a pane the other panes are resize proportionaly

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterResizeMode.EndPane
member.summary: On resize of a pane the end pane in the splitter is resized also

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlideDirection
member.summary: Specifies the available directions for the slide panes

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlideDirection.Right
member.summary: Slide panes are sliding from left to right

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlideDirection.Left
member.summary: Slide panes are sliding from right to left

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlideDirection.Top
member.summary: Slide panes are sliding from top to bottom

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlideDirection.Bottom
member.summary: Slide panes are sliding from bottom to top

member.name: T:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlidePaneTabView
member.summary: Specifies views of the pane tab

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlidePaneTabView.TextAndImage
member.summary: Pane tab is displayed using its Title and Icon

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlidePaneTabView.TextOnly
member.summary: Pane tab is displayed using only its Title

member.name: F:Telerik.WebControls.RadSplitterSlidePaneTabView.ImageOnly
